      void scenarioCollisions(Player player, java.util.LinkedList gameObjects)
      Checks collision with the objects in the scenario If the game object is ammo grab it and increments the ammo counter of the player If it is the boat it will invert the collision system and enter the boat

    • Method Detail

      • scenarioCollisions

        public void scenarioCollisions(Player player,
                               java.util.LinkedList gameObjects)
        Checks collision with the objects in the scenario If the game object is ammo grab it and increments the ammo counter of the player If it is the boat it will invert the collision system and enter the boat
        Parameters:
        player - Player
        gameObjects - Objects which the player can interact with

      • bulletsCollision

        public void bulletsCollision(Player player,
                             java.util.LinkedList<Bullet> bullets,
                             java.util.LinkedList<Enemy> enemies,
                             java.util.LinkedList<ImmovableGameObject> staticGOCollision)
        Checks when the bullets collide with enemies and bunkers
        Parameters:
        player - Player
        bullets - The bullets instantiated in the game
        enemies - Enemies
        staticGOCollision - The static objects which takes health from the player

      • isBetweenEdges

        public boolean isBetweenEdges(GameObject gameObject,
                              int dx,
                              int dy)
        Restricts where the player can go to or against with
        Parameters:
        gameObject - Game object that we want to move
        dx - X delta movement
        dy - Y delta movement
        Returns:
        If the game object can move
